issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h2. Description
Application having 1 button only that calls the login webs service and use the same library, the response of the web service returns succes on android and ios versions but in mobileweb version is showing error Method not allowed with message as "The requested resource does not support http method 'OPTIONS'".

h2. Test code
Please got to the link below to download the sample code to reproduce the issue.

http://www.mediafire.com/?1yl81brfprldort
fields.summary: MobileWeb:A call to web service return success on android and iPhone but return Method not allowed error on Mobile web

comments.body: This is a limitation of web browsers. You MUST use a proxy or enable CORS on the web service server. If you use a proxy, you MUST define the Ti.Network.httpURLFormatter.
